author: Ayla Albayrak
title: Drop in Asylum Applications Relieves European Burden
text:
BERLIN–Asylum applications in Europe dropped by nearly half last year, easing pressure on a region whose politics were upended by record numbers of arrivals in recent years.
Some 707,000 migrants applied for asylum in Europe in 2017, the European Union’s asylum agency, or EASO, said on Thursday. This marked a 43% percent fall from the 2016 level, which was itself slightly below the 2015 post-war record of 1.4 million applications.
